analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/24/0x736797ce7f301fd4de03ea865a3a91ae3def66bc.sol:
	Contract ROD has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/24/0x736797ce7f301fd4de03ea865a3a91ae3def66bc.sol#290)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/24/0x736797ce7f301fd4de03ea865a3a91ae3def66bc.sol:

Parameter '_newOwner' of Ownable.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/24/0x736797ce7f301fd4de03ea865a3a91ae3def66bc.sol#66-68) is not in mixedCase
